page1.title: About Me
page1.content: Hi! . . My name is Jordi, an MSc student at the VU/UvA (one of the funky joint-degrees :smile:). . I live in the Netherlands and love everything related to computer-related topics. Being solely limited to my creativity to create: programming allows me to try and push my boundaries. . Yet, computer topics do not tend to satisfy my curious mind. This is where biology/psychology comes into play! I love everything about the concept of evolution and the sheer complexity of biology when you consider the underlying chemistry and physics. . This blog covers a bit of both, combining some Machine Learning topics that either bridge the gap between computers and biology or simply because machine learning is a lot of fun to do. .
